name: Dan Powers
text:
This is the best place to order quality pizza in the area from a pizza franchise.
I ordered a comparable pie from Domino‚Äôs on Friday and ordered from Hungry ‚Ä¶More

name: Sam Catron
text: Fast service - ordered online and picked up in 15 minutes. Lots of toppings and hot when I picked it up.

name: Charlotte Fields
text: My family and I ordered a meat lover's pizza and a supreme pizza from Hungry Howie's about one week ago. The pizzas were wonderful and the butter cheese crust was outstanding! My family and I will be ordering from Hungry Howie's again very soon!

name: Angie Payseur
text: Pre-ordered. Hot and Ready when I arrived. Gentleman working was very nice!

name: Dan T
text: Does "pizza sauce" come with cajun Howie bread or not??? I thought it did. Last few times it did not. What happens if I order extra? ü§î

name: Richard Racioppi
text: Another regular place for the wife's crafting supplies.

name: Ajah Simone
text: Hungry Howies is making a comeback for sure. The servings are way smaller than they used to be. Other then that they straight.

name: Don Shore
text: Best take out pizza in GSO area. Excellent service and reasonable prices.

name: han nguyen
text: Tomato sauce!? What tomato sauce? The cheese, butter and garlic were the only saving grace. It's not bad, it was actually still kinda good, but there's definitely better for not much more. Service was good, nice people. I give it 3.5 stars.

name: James Williamson III
text: The pepperoni cheese bread was amazing

name: Gregory Bryant
text: The pizza was good and I plan going there again to try other items.

name: Inell C
text: I was very pleased when I walked into the front office. It was beautiful and very clean. I was greeted by a girl named Ray. She was very pleasant and informative. She made my husband and I feel welcome. When we did our tour both spaces were ‚Ä¶More

name: Ernestine R
text: The pizza was extremely Greasy. I‚Äôd I had been closer I would have returned it. I could literally squeeze grease out of the slices.

name: Embra Sease
text: Pizza Hut no sauce on it so it was dry

name: Felicia Mills
text:
Every time I order they are on point!! So thankful to see Hungry Howies back in Greensboro(more than 1 location)!
John is awesome, super patient, customer oriented!! Keep up the great work guys!!

name: Susan Naud√©
text: Out of all of the delivery pizza places this is our favorite. the flavored crust is excellent their thin crust pizza is very good. the sauce isn't as salty tasting as other delivery pizza brands. The Howie bread is also very good. And if you have someone not in the mood for pizza their salads are decent.

name: Queen Khadija
text: My CSR said 45min. Ms. Lady got it here in less than 30 and it was DOPE! Thanks again üòÅüëç

name: Dana Cecere
text: Only order for delivery. Food gets to my place super quick and super hot. Within the past year, the delivery people have been the best. Every single one of them has been extremely nice.

name: Melanie and Abbie Handy
text: Great staff. Manager is top notch he is always helpful. Good value and great pizza

name: Crystal Mattison
text: Amazing subs always been a favorite of mine over 10 years now!!

name: mina Askaros
text: Best pizza in town and great customer service

name: J.T Blankenship
text: I enjoyed it. The crust flavors sold me along with the 25c pizza.

name: Shawn h watkins
text:
Very good pizza and it arrived still hot, we had it delivered.
The supreme pizza could use a little more toppings but the crust was so tasty..

name: Chad Grant
text: Good pizza.  Fast and friendly service.  Reasonable prices.

name: Suzanne Vogeley
text: I wish there were more Hungry Howies in the Triad!  I love the variety of options available to customers, from toppings to crust flavors and dipping sauce.  I know other big-name competitors offer similar options but they can't touch this ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Horn
text: This place is a rip off. 1.50 for onions on a sub, they must be crazy. 1st and last time ill ever eat at hungry howie's. Also beware of the 5 dollar delivery fee. They were quick to charge me for onions, but failed to bring the included dressing for the sub. Horrible place

name: Kenroy Davis
text: Pizza is not that great but its edible

name: Corey Bottoms
text: I would have probably given it a 5 but I've only been there twice those times the service was great and the food was pretty dang delicious looking forward to next time I go

name: Amanda Henry
text: Horrible customer service. Rude employees. Ordered a steak cheese and mushroom sub and there was no steak on it. Ridiculous

name: Ricky Campbell
text: Friendly staff. Outstanding food and service exactly what a Howie's pie should taste like.

name: Lakera Stevenson
text: The food is awesome and the staff is really nice and polite

name: Bernd Doss
text: Excellent service with great comfort food.

name: Dustin Win
text: Favorite take-out pizza place. Hungry Howies has that good crust on deck.

name: David
text: Good deals, less known than other chains, but very good for the money

name: matthew hackman
text: I / we drive from Kernersville to Greensboro, passing a hundred or so pizza shops just to get to Hungry Howies. It's just that GOOD! :)

name: Avant Lowe
text: Good pizza and the have self Pizza which is  like 4to6 slices of pizza

name: Shymari Huntley
text: I used to think Hungry Howie's Pizza was low quality pizza until I tried this location. Literally beats any other fast food pizza place. It's always fresh, hot, and full of flavor. No comparison! If I plan to have a pizza night, it will come from here. The prices are amazing too. Got a large pizza for 4.99 today with a coupon.

name: starscreamwarrior
text: I wish their site would tell you if the store you choose actually do delivery or not. Here I am selecting delivery and I'm waiting almost an hour and i call them up for them to tell me they only do carryout's but a delivery is a 2.00 charge. Slightly disappointed but their food is still good.

name: Gaynell Mason
text: Came down to Greensboro from Roanoke Virginia this past weekend had basketball tournament in Winston Salem the kids from the team wanted pizza and we ordered like 12 pizza's some were cheese some were pepperoni and some was bacon and ‚Ä¶More

name: Melissa Anderson
text: Pizza is great so is the assistant manager. Won't deliver cause I'm .2 outside of there 5 miles will no longer order from there

name: dontae donnell
text: On point

name: Fanchon Little
text: Ok pizza

name: Karim Tamer
text: I had a steak cheese and mushroom sub that absolutely had NO meat they totally forgot about the meat somehow, it was terrible!!!

name: aadhya patel
text: nice service. reasonable rate.

name: Mike Broadwell
text: If you're looking for inexpensive this is a good choice. Pizza is good and the staff is friendly.

name: Daniel Thompson
text: I've been here many times and the pizza has always been on time and fresh.  Never had a problem here.  One of my favorite things here is their flavored crusts, nobody beats them imo.

name: Kimberly Dunn
text: Need more help and I feel like the mg on dudid more then the help he had

name: Michael Ball
text: Thought I would try Hungry Howie's today (01/04/15).   Excellent calzone!  Good prices, courteous staff, and fast service.  Would definitely recommend!

name: Mary Strayhorn
text: Good service.

name: Tiffany McCain
text: Good place to go to when you want quick meal not expensive.

name: Jaime English
text: Customer appreciation day here is a joke. No organization whatsoever. Ordered online to make things easier and ended up waiting longer for the same thing everyone else was walking out with. Only redeeming thing here is that the pizza is good and close to my house.

name: Michele McCandless
text: The flavored crusts and the Asian wings keep me coming back.

name: Audrey Turner
text: I love coming to Hungry Howies! The owner makes the best pizza you could get! I get my pizza fast and you couldn't get better pizza anywhere else!

name: Darvitta Edwards
text: Absolutely love their 1st friday pizza price

name: Jarrin G
text: Always good...always fresh!!! #ThinkPink #BreastCancerAwareness

name: Fran A Nichole
text: Many flavor options & they now have stuff crust

name: Amy Steffen
text: Very confused.  How can it be the "best in the triad"?  Drove by there (5710 High Point Road) today 8/30/14, and the sign reads "coming soon".  Are these reviews for the same restaurant?

name: Adam Thomas
text: They offered free food opening day and I've had once since. I feel very bad after eating this pizza.

name: Cathy Robinson
text: Taste pretty good.

name: elizabeth finneran
text: Cheap but often tastes like it

name: Geo
text: Asked to have exterior table cleaned twice finally had to clean it myself . Ordered turkey club worst processed meat available lettuce was brown tomatoes old. Had to put topping on  myselfthey gave me in a   plastic sandwich bag. WORST HOWIES EVER GOOD LUCK IF YOU GO THERE

text: I've only had it a few times but it's preeettyy yummy!!!!! üçï!!!!

text: asian wings are good,but do not do the delivery, there prices are ridiculous, asian wings $8.49  for (8) wings then small cup of ranch dressing $0.75 then delivery fee $1.50 and this crazy 6.75% tax total $11.49.....they got one once but wont get me again
